Strength Training

Strength training, also known as resistance training, involves working against a force to build muscle and increase endurance. It is a highly effective way to improve body composition, increase bone density, and enhance functional strength. Whether lifting weights, using resistance bands, or performing bodyweight exercises, strength training offers a wide range of benefits for the entire body. In addition to muscle growth, it boosts metabolism, helps maintain healthy body weight, and reduces the risk of injury by strengthening tendons and ligaments. It is a crucial element of a well-rounded fitness routine.
